website_summaries.verdict: For $200, you get a fast, unique-looking router with lots of extra security for all your connected devices. The first year is free, but you will have to pay to keep all the security features. For the price, it's still a good router that is easy to manage (via an app) for a medium-size home.
pros: It has anti-malware, parental controls and network prioritization for all your devices
The top speed on 2.4GHz and 5GHz was great, and it looks interesting enough that you may want to show it off
cons: You can only access the router with an app
Its speed dropped off quickly as more obstacles were in the way
The Ethernet and USB ports on the router are hard to access

website_summaries.verdict: The Norton Core is as stunning as routers come, and it's packed with security and parental control features to protect every device in your home, from PC to smart fridge.
pros: Traffic monitoring to detect malicious activity
Extends protection to IoT and other smart devices
Unlimited device licenses for antivirus software included
cons: Best features require monthly subscription fee after the first year

customer_reviews.title: Faster that Netgear R8000
customer_reviews.text: Almost twice the speed of my Netgear R8000 even with deep packet inspection settings at maximum. This thing screams. Metal Fortiguard test was phenomenal. Moved from Cujo to this since Cujo doesn’t work as advertised and doesn’t block most malware/viruses and its blacklist is outdated.
customer_reviews.author: HamsterRat

customer_reviews.title: A great router from Norton
customer_reviews.text: A great router from Norton. Many argue that this router will slow down your connection. As it's true to a certain extent, i'm confident Norton will continue to develop firmware updates to balance speed versus security. The range of this router is great as well. Place it somewhat in the middle of your home and you should be plenty covered. Key Points - Setup via app versus webpage - Not a modem/router 2-in-1. You will need to purchase a separate modem as this is purely a wireless router. - Looks great in the home. Does not look like the Kylo Ren ship Netgear Nighthawk router.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: I love the addition of the Norton Core onto my network
customer_reviews.text: I love the addition of the Norton Core onto my network. I'm now able to control my network much better and love that it provides way more security than my previous setup. It's nice to be able to monitor the network from my phone including how many devices are on the network, the security score, any potential threats and what the speed is at any given time. I also LOVE the fact that I can control how much access my kids have to the devices including what time, which websites, and how much bandwidth. Overall, this product exceeds my expectations and provides the necessary information and security our family needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hameed Hirani

customer_reviews.title: Good router, with a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I love how I can control so much of the security of my network with this router. However, I had limited speed until there was a firmware update a few months back. But I still continuously have issues with IP assignment on my devices. They routinely change their names because "a device with the name (my computer/iphone/whatever) already exists on the network. This happens even when I assign a static reserved IP for a specific device. It's pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Core disabled by subscription
customer_reviews.text: Norton core is an expensive experiment. For $249 you get a router connected to Symantec in an integral way. The device has to be activated by Symantec to work. Without a subscription it’s locked. With the second hand devices they simply do not work. They are tied to the initial activation. That means if you want to use it you need to be an additional $119 for the year or $10 a month. It’s the only model if you just want a router that is unsustainable. At this price point there are several alternatives which are better in terms of routers.
customer_reviews.author: Sigara

customer_reviews.title: Something that works the first time
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy as advertised. Plugged it in, it then updated and configured itself and then as for SSID and password details.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Setup was a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: The Norton Core works well and setup was a breeze. Throughput was strong throughout my two-story house, even in areas that have been historically weak in regards to WIFI signal. Styling - I like the futuristic look and compliments my TV and cable modem in the living room. The gray color helps in this regard as well. Overall I am happy with the product and I would recommend it for anyone needing a WIFI router. As a bonus, this came with one free year of Norton Antivirus (and no subscription is needed after 1 year) which is a welcome an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: André

customer_reviews.title: Solid Reception, Antivirus Protection and Parental Controls
customer_reviews.text: I live in 5000+ square feet 2 story home. Prior to purchasing and installing Norton Core Secure Wifi Router, I needed multiple routers to support wifi around the house. Now with one router I can use wifi anywhere in the house. Reception is solid with Antivirus protection. Parental control features are bonus features. Since it doesn't look like a router and more like table top ornament, it can be placed anywhere in the house without the ugliness. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MMistry

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be used for online gaming!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, easy to setup, high speeds for streaming and downloads, HOWEVER, absolutely cannot be used for online gaming. Whatever this gizmo is doing with the data stream (security scan?) is causing packet loss and huge ping delays up to and exceeding 3000ms which kicks me out of my game frequently. Cant get a refund because I have had it more than 30 days. Bought a Netgear Nighthawk to replace this flawed device.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Brown

customer_reviews.title: You won;t be able to set it up the same day that you receive the device
customer_reviews.text: The design and the packaging quality are amazing, beautiful. However, the problems started way too soon. After downloading the 3 star-rated app on my iPhone, I went on to create an account through it and then followed the prompts to complete the initial setup. Before that could happen, I got a message saying that the device didn't have a valid subscription. Apparently, this device won't work without that subscription, that's what the Norton representative explained, and because this was purchased through a third party (Amazon) they had to create a case, escalate it, and the resolution would be reached within 1-2 business days. It just gave me an overall bad feeling and have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The core has be reliable, aside from some server glitches most likely from high traffic when I first set it up, the speed and protection from malware sites has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lagowski

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product after a friend strongly recommended it. Given the fact that the number of network attacks are on the rise, one can never be too careful about network security. So far the product works as advertised, has a long wireless range and the security obviously extends to all the devices connected to it. I have quite a few smart devices ( Amazon Echo dot etc... ) which in itself may not have the best security in place. All in all this device definitely keeps my mind at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Virendra Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Looks amazing for a router (got compliments ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Looks amazing for a router (got compliments already) and a lot more powerful than my old AC1900 router. Reaches all corners of a ~2000 sqft house. Getting near max MBPS which is the most important. Security features are good for providing some additional piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: R. LIAO

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy to use, looks cool: what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This router is so cool! Probably the first router I've ever had that actually looks great in the living room. And importantly, does the job well and is blazing fast, which is an important consideration for WiFi. Great improvement over my old Netgear router!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This router is awesome BUT I wish it had a built-in modem since ...
customer_reviews.text: This router is awesome BUT I wish it had a built-in modem since it costs $200+!! I love the security features that it comes with. Easy to use once installed. Looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: RIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Great router control at a reasonable price.  Ranges all over a 5200 sq ft two story home and the attached garage.
customer_reviews.text: This router did everything i expected and more. I was very impressed with the iPhone app that lets me control the router. It has many features I did not expect. like tracking individual device bandwidth usage. It also presents the total bandwidth up and down speed on the start up screen, considering I only have DSL available at my remote location, I find this information very useful. The router was simple to set up, the only down side was that the password required at least one special character, and i was unable to connect my older wireless printer because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Really nice router!
customer_reviews.text: Setup was really easy through the app. I purchased this to gain more control over the connected devices to my network, and this allows me to do just that! I also feel more secure with this connected router through Norton's security features. I highly recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Phenominal!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product, one you wont want to hide in your study. Comes with one year of free Norton Anti Virus for all the computers in the house. The setup process is very easy but require you to have a smartphone, but lets face it if you're buying such a high quality router you probably do. The app allows you can monitor various parapets about your internet service, and its security rating, which can be improved with suggestions through the app. The best part about this router is serurity it provides while web browsing. It will scan and stop you from downlaoding malware containing files. Im very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DR5476

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and great WiFi reception!
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a breeze and the app works well. I love the fact that it doesn't look like a traditional router. WiFi reception works well in my two story home. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hussain h

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful device however after frustration spending hours trying the simple install instructions, eventually spoke to Norton and they state that this item is no longer for sale and will not work. In addition because its serial number was registered to another user it would never work for anyone else and should NEVER be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Speeds are noticeably faster and I can easily keep track of the 10+ devices connected to my ...
customer_reviews.text: This router is stellar. For someone focused on design, it serves as a statement piece but can also add character to any room. Speeds are noticeably faster and I can easily keep track of the 10+ devices connected to my network with ease. The support team is available around the clock to assist you in getting set up. Thus far, no issues. I would definitely recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Ally H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Will recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.text: The Core was super easy to set up. The app is also very user friendly and easy to navigate and use. We have set up a bunch of devices to the router, and they are all working on the fastest speeds that I have ever seen. Also the router covers the whole house which our other router failed to do. Overall it's an amazing product. 5/5. Will be recommending to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Zain

customer_reviews.title: Warning: They allow it to ship overseas but you cannot use it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought it for a gift and they allow it to ship overseas but then you find out it is Geo Locked. The description only says it is available for the USA but they still allow you to ship it out...called tech support and of course got the details then.
customer_reviews.author: Ap2015

customer_reviews.title: Good internet speeds and long range
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this device for a few days and it is fabulous. Good internet speeds and long range . I would definitely recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hrushikesh Apte

customer_reviews.title: Great security okay performance
customer_reviews.text: It is more then working have stop ove 5000 threats and have not interfere with gaming or watching stuff online.. pne thing that would of made it better is more lan ports. Over a great network solution
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Manko

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and great app
customer_reviews.text: This device is fast, secure and setup was quite simple. Our overall internet connection and Wi-Fi is much faster now. It is significantly better than our Netgear router and it also looks chic and nice! I would recommend this product to others. The app works great too - appreciate how easy it is to navigate and Norton customer service was great with setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We tried probably a hundred times to get this to work and then paid for a computer tech to come to our house. He tried another hundred times to get it to work and it will not work. I tried to return it and it says we cannot return. If the product is faulty, you should be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design, fits right in with the furniture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design, fits right in with the furniture. I have all my devices connected with this router. Works great and as expected. I didn't see the downgrade in speed that others saw. I like the added security that it provides to all of my devices over the tp-link router I was using before. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Adhanom

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure way to have WiFi in your home and even control guest access!
customer_reviews.text: This device is incredibly easy to set up! Easy to Configure! Easy to Manage and control! The coverage is unbelievable. I was about to buy a Wifi Extender device which had 3 devices that you put throughout the house. Not with the Norton Core. I was able to use it throughout the house and outside in my yard - all the way to my neighbor's yard. WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Berolo

customer_reviews.title: It’s like I’m running with more mbps
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an improvement over my Motorola Surfboard 2! Running the same speed from my provider, it runs everything all at the same time, but only so much quicker. It’s like I’m running with more mbps. I already use Norton’s other products and their developers have proven their excellence in the Core, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Router operates subpar without active Norton subscription
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this router last year, I was unaware that it only operated successfully with an ongoing Norton 'antivirus' subscription. My subscription expired a few months ago. First, my screen was inundated with pop-ups from Norton to renew. There was no easy way to end those apart from getting rid of the Norton software. Now, my gmail loads slowly, if at all. My passwords don't work. Websites including government sites are inaccessible. It is not my internet service nor is it my MacBook Air. It is Norton's goodbye gesture when you refuse to pay for their subscription. This was not a cheap router, so I do feel Norton should be clear that it won't work without the subscription.
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Randomly drops connection after < 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Randomly drops connection after <2 years of use. Warranty expired stuck with a useless device and wasted >$265 !!! The product is so bad that they don't sell it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished peice of crap. Gifted it to a friend who was unable to get tech support since he was not the purchaser...he had to ask me to call for him?? And it still doesn't work. Tech support was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Carmason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination of design, security, and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, an amazing router in terms of speed and security. I have approx 12 devices connected at any given time and performance is never sacrificed. Between smart TVs, laptops, and iPhones...everything runs extremely fast and very smooth. The design is very stylish and allows me to place the router in a central location anywhere in my home. Furthermore, the security features are awesome including the app notifying me anytime a device has connected to my network. Between the design and the security features plus the performance, this router will stay with me for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amaan Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Best home router and firewall
customer_reviews.text: Does the job great. Blocks what needs to be blocked. Kids cant get around it when using iPhone like every other product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Quilhot

customer_reviews.title: NortonCore; the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: NC is a bit tough to setup, but their tech support are very savvy and helped me through the initial hiccups. I’m actually glad the install install is complicated. That makes more confident the software is vey tough.
customer_reviews.author: Opa

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek, and works really well. You don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks sleek, and works really well. You don't lose a noticeable amount of speed even with all the added security features.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that I am very happy with the purchase of this router and was pleasantly ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Norton Core Secure WiFi router to replace the Comcast router I was using which was known to constantly slow down my internet connection to a dramatic stop on my various laptops and FireStick TV. I have a business and a home office so I appreciate the added security that the Norton Core Secure router has provided. I get notifications from the app that I downloaded informing me of any suspicious activity that was blocked. I have to say that I am very happy with the purchase of this router and was pleasantly surprised to see the difference with the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Parbtani

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fast, super-secure, and it's easy to setup and use. The security settings are very strong, and the individual user settings are intuitive and flexible. It's great that it regularly updates its configuration to fight the most recent exploits. The iOS app also comes in real handy for tweaking with the configurations and leveraging parental controls for activating content-filters.
customer_reviews.author: Mayur

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy. Easy to install - Took like few ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Easy to install - Took like few minutes to set it up, Looks awesome - this is a beautiful looking router, Compatibility- Very much compatible with my existing modem and ISP, no hiccups at all
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: A highly secure and fast router
customer_reviews.text: This router is amazing. The app makes it very easy to setup. The router is extremely small and fits easily and looks good as well. I would recommend this router to anyone who wants to operate in a highly secure network.
customer_reviews.author: Baapu

customer_reviews.title: Great product, clean design.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, clean design, the packaging is nice (similar level as Apple products). This WiFi Router is a well-done finished product and works like a charm. Norton has built a good consumer app and it is able to deliver on its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Online Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. I have been using it for few ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have been using it for few days and very happy with it. It looks great and works very well. I like the security features of the router. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav

customer_reviews.title: An extra layer of protection for your computer and other devices.
customer_reviews.text: Norton Core is a fine product. It is easy to set up and requires little monitoring. The app on your phone makes it easy to manage the Core and to add devices to its protection. The app also shows you when the device's firmware has been updated and what threats have been blocked. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R Colton

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and get running
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and get running. My connections are much faster and reliable now than they were with my cable company-provided equipment. The dead zone in my downstairs living room is history!
customer_reviews.author: LKG

customer_reviews.title: peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Love the peace of mind the router provides. It makes sure that my internet traffic is safe and blocks insecure traffic and potential viruses. Also, it's beautiful and super easy to set up. I was up and running in less than 5 minutes. I haven't seen any drop in network speed compared to my old router.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Kletzl

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product. Loved the design. The inclusion of a years subscription of antivirus software is also pretty neat. The router coverage was very good. The only con is that for the given price the router performance is average. Overrall I would recommend buying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Very solid wireless router. Easy set up, it has a good range and doesn’t seem to present any dead areas in my home. I also love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! The range on this is perfect as I am usually outside on my laptop. The fact that I can also connect multiple devices without losing performance is great as well. The mobile app is a great addition as well. I would highly recommend anyone to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: amin shariff

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Friend recommended I purchase this because of the number of connections I need, and I'm very glad I did. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good experience. I did experience some issues early on ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good experience. I did experience some issues early on with internet connectivity, but honestly unclear whether that was caused by Norton Core or my ISP. Great wifi coverage in my 2500 sq ft house, one story, wooden construction. Love the ability to pause internet for dinner or to force stubborn kids to do the chores/go to bed, etc. without even being home. App works well, although could provide better visual feedback when you pause/resume internet access.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Bore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Norton Core. I have had several routers and this one has worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly WiFi Router
customer_reviews.text: Bought this router when I switched broadband providers. Easy to setup and I like the app on my iPhone to check usage and sometimes limit access for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: SAMPorter

customer_reviews.title: i was lied to, so don't buy this device
customer_reviews.text: The product is useless. Never connected. There's a firmware issue and it will not connect to the cloud. Cyber security at it's finest. No breaches for sure. I am told because I purchased this from Amazon I cannot get a replacement and I paid well over $200 for what was advertised as a secure "IoT" secure device.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2Live!

customer_reviews.title: Hope It Is Working
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume it is working as it is supposed to be working.
customer_reviews.author: rdl051

customer_reviews.title: Unit could never be set-up ;
customer_reviews.text: It is still new. But never connected to the Internet. I don't know how to return, or replace this thing. Saaaaad!
customer_reviews.author: Dan M. Mamatela

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product from Norton - need to shrink the size
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, good connectivity, solid bandwidth - overall, happy with the purchase. The only drawback is that it's big and bulky. Reminds me of the spheres outside the Amazon HQ Day 1 building without the transparency.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Slow and no support
customer_reviews.text: This is a good way to turn gigabit internet into 50mb internet. Tech support is awful. Difficult to reach connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Liked it while it was working stopped lots of threats to all devices connected, including phones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Set-up was easy (follow the instructions)
customer_reviews.text: I rely on Norton and the Core simply reinforces my trust. Set-up was easy (follow the instructions).
customer_reviews.author: William Roy Ives

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have money to throw away
customer_reviews.text: Had mine a little over a year and it gets no power at all.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Joy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Google Fiber
customer_reviews.text: I searched the documentation and there is no mention of this device not supported on Google Fiber. I'm canceling all of my products that I have with Norton and going elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great router and great design
customer_reviews.text: Tested the product for a week. Great router and great design. Easy to set up and provides reliable speeds. Would highly recommend this product for secruity and performance.
customer_reviews.author: A.Lira

customer_reviews.title: Great router! Great visual addition to the house
customer_reviews.text: Great router! Great visual addition to the house, and it is fast and easy to set up. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: LizLiz

customer_reviews.title: Geolocked
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this router if you live outside USA as it is geolocked and you will not be able to use it
customer_reviews.author: setsparksflyin

customer_reviews.title: Great Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Norton Core for a few months now after frustrating experiences with Comcast/Xfinity and Netgear routers. Love the Core.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limited functionality
customer_reviews.text: The lack of the ability to DMZ specific devices on your network makes this out early useless to me. it's the first router I've ever purchased that you cannot do this. Norton tried to tell me that UPNP is the same, it is not and does achieve the desired results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape
customer_reviews.text: I like this product bc it makes my products free from virus. I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not work outside of the US
customer_reviews.text: Not specified anywhere, but this will work nowhere else but the US, had to return it due to this fact.
customer_reviews.author: Esther A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and great range
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and the range is fantastic around the house. Would Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, fast speeds, and secure!
customer_reviews.text: First off, i love the way this router looks. I can put it anywhere in my house without being cautious of how it may look. Sectonldy, great performance! I can clearly tell a difference in how much better the connection is with this router. There were multiple rooms in my house that were avoided because the wifi would not work. Say no more! I can finally hang out in these rooms and use wifi at great speeds. Lastly, I love the privacy around this product. When you have kids who go to mysterious sites sometimes, it is important to be protected. No issues with malware or viruses!
customer_reviews.author: Iqbal Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and performance
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice to have a top-end router that's also gorgeous to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Patankar

customer_reviews.title: Good security router
customer_reviews.text: Great router with bunch of security related features with protection for IoT devices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faster than my apple extreme
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice, super easy to setup, and I get better performance than my Apple Extreme, with the added security!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: ... says on the tin and is so quick and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says on the tin and is so quick and easy to set up. Our entire home is protected and I don't have to worry about parental control either Brilliant !
customer_reviews.author: Marek Wasilewski

customer_reviews.title: Has Performed Well Thus Far
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Norton Core for a year or so now. I've given it a 4-star rating because I want to wait longer for a more accurate review and perhaps eventually give it 5 stars. I'm trying to compare the old router with the Core to see if my speed has gone down, up or remained the same. I would already recommend it because of its security features.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the Bitdefender Box 2
customer_reviews.text: The product is not recommended the device always stuck to the end! also the support never reported by e-mail!
customer_reviews.author: Kruse Bruno

customer_reviews.title: You cannot use a static IP
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use a static IP. No command line or even web based interface. You have to us the mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: greggm

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it.  Will likely regret it.  Shame on Symantec.
customer_reviews.text: Great when it works. Often does not. Will even block all internet access to YOUR trusted devices. This is letting a capricious tyrant control your network.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barwick

customer_reviews.title: BEFORE YOU BUY! Be aware that the Core is constantly connected to Norton Servers... and if the servers go down, you lose all con
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE YOU BUY! Be aware that the Core is constantly connected to Norton Servers... and if the servers go down, you lose all connectivity on your house. I've been without WiFi all day. Norton tells me to go back to my old WiFi router while they fix it.. (One hour tinkering worth modem/routers/core, 1.5 hours on hold calling Norton Support, and 5 hours waiting for the problem to be solved and nothing yet). Also... there's not anywhere in Norton's website to track the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves Arozqueta Rojano

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to set up as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. No documentation with the product and none that addressed my problems online. Had problems with network printers which would not recognize the Norton Core network!!!. While it looks cool, it is very awkward to place and view the light indicator!!! Returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: NK~PA

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This expensive router caused nothing but trouble from the time it was installed until I went back to my old NETGEAR router. One of the problems I suspected but was not sure about until going back to my old router was the speed of my iPhone. It had been slow for several months but it was not until the old router was up and working that the source of the problem became clear. During the time the Core was being used we could count on one type of problem with streaming or printing just about every 3-4 days. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this piece of crap. Been a problem ever since it was installed. Constantly loosing wifi signal to my network and has to be reset often. Resets take as much as two days to get system back on line. Also, can not be installed without cell phone. WHAT?? Norton got too cute with this one by about a factor of 50.
customer_reviews.author: Taletha Beam

customer_reviews.title: This was a mistake. Intermittant connections, dropped connections ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a mistake. Intermittant connections, dropped connections, I have spoken with Norton 6 times in the last week and every person tells me it will be fixed. I guess it was a mistake to pre-order. Multiple firmware updates, so there must have been issues. And now it is too late to return to Amazon, so I guess I am out about 200$. No more Norton for me.
customer_reviews.author: Portland Dude

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Multiple disconnects a day. Look on Norton's forums, many having these problems. I gave it several firmware updates, but still garbage. An expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kmp14

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: Set up should be simple, but after an hour on the phone with tech we're still not set up (reminded me of early 2000's tech support). The only resolution was to have level 2 call me 'within 24 hours'. The inability to schedule a time... or range of time... with support is unreal given the clientele who are buying this are A. busy and B. used to service. I have not been able to connect with Level 2 during their random mid-of-the-day calls. Will update the review upon successful completion or return of the product.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work and when it was hooked up I lost my security system internet link on my cell phone and computer. Once I disconnected it and restored my century link modem to normal I got my security link back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, couldn't get the App to pair with the device. Ended up shipping it back. And I work on data networks for a living.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worked with the Norton tech people for two days. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked with the Norton tech people for two days. The core was faulty. After hours they admitted that they have had trouble with the core connecting. They told me I would need to return this one and try another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia A. Warstler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for 10 months and it worked perfect. Then last Friday it stopped working. Since then I’ve been on with Norton’s technical support for over 3 1/2 hours and they won’t replace the unit even though it’s under warranty. Don’t buy this, they don’t support their product
customer_reviews.author: Edward Generose

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: most of my stuff is not compatible, printer, new xbox.
customer_reviews.author: whodatnana

customer_reviews.title: Norton Core Router
customer_reviews.text: This router is too secure. Constantly scanning. Impossible to view Netflix....disconnects from server....says "No WiFi Service". If you have guest in your home....can only support up to six devices....constant knocking you off the WiFi. You can assign a "Primary Device"....doesn't knock you off the internet as much. I returned the product and hooked up my old router.....all working perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E. Horst

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This thing was nothing but a head ache. Did not live up to its claim. Very slow and had to be roobeted daily so I went a got a NETGEAR nighthawk and wow what difference... will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: danielm

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it would not hook up to my computer because I did not have an apple phone or other device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functionality problems.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed for functionality. It was designed for beauty. The power supply plug is designed in the wrong configuration as to take up 3 plugs on an APC UBS battery backup unit. It also takes up 3 plugs on a surge protector cord. Those who have their WiFi devices, Modems, Switches etc on a UBS system will experience this problem. I cannot comment on the actual functionality of the device as I did not even get that far, for without it being on my APC UBS I would loose WiFi in the event of power drops and losses. One last issue, it does take up a great deal of space.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A

product_meta.title: Norton by Symantec Granite Gray Norton Core Secure WiFi Router, Built-in Network, Device and Antivirus Security, Smart Parental Controls, Replaces Wireless Router
product_meta.description: Norton Core is a secure WiFi router that helps protect your home network and an unlimited number of your devices, including computers, mobile and smart home devices against malware, viruses, hackers, and cybercriminals. Norton Core is available for purchase and use only in the US.
feature_bullets: High performance wifi router: Stream your favorite movies in 4K, play online games or download content with Core’s powerful dual core processor
Multi layer protection: Comprehensive network security to protect your connected home from malware, viruses, phishing tactics and even botnets
Protect all connected devices: A 1 yr subscription to Norton Security is included to protect your Macs, PCs, tablets, smartphones & smart devices
Smart parental controls: Manage screen time by setting content filters or daily limits on usage And when needed, pause the Internet
Easy set up: Bluetooth enabled iOS/Android device with a mobile data plan is needed; Download the Norton Core app to complete set up; Modem required

specifications.Operating System: Mac OS X, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows 10
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars246 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
